channel.title: Is there a way to make
channel.description: Is there a way to make the real skillcape emotes like in Runescape? I've been on a server a while back that had that, and I was wondering if any of you knew how, or if it's even possible. If so, it's probably hard.

Read full topic

It’s not possible. There you go.
[/quote] wrong codeusa coders and developers allready made quest emote exatcly like rs 2[/quote]

Its not EXACTLY like the original, the top of the emote is dark blue when it should be a light cyan.
